headline: Chipotle (CMG): 3 Reasons We Love This Stock
summary: Since May 2024, Chipotle has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 1.1% while floating around $62.40. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 12.7% gain during that period.

headline: Better Stock to Buy Right Now: Chipotle vs. Cava
summary: Cava is a Mediterranean chain and a relatively young buck, while Chipotle is more established.  In the third quarter, Cava handily outpaced Chipotle in a few key areas.  The Mediterranean restaurant chain reported revenue growth of 39% year over year, compared to Chipotle's 13%.
